bannerMarketing.title: Best %
bannerMarketing.subtitle: Deposit with a rate of up to 16% per annum. Convenient terms – from 1 month to 3 years.

safetyRules.one: Do not tell anyone your SMS codes, even if you are being contacted on behalf of SBERBANK employees. These are scammers.
safetyRules.two: If you are asked to install a program on your device under the pretext of technical support or protection of funds, do not do this. These are scammers.
safetyRules.three: SberBank calls customers from the 900 phone, if the security service calls you from other phones, these are scammers.
safetyRules.four: SberBank never asks customers to transfer funds to «secure accounts», only scammers do this.
safetyRules.title: Safety rules
